title: description
Country: A region that is identified as a distinct entity in political geography.

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdBy.description
Country: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdOn.description
Country: The date and time when the entity instance was created

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedBy.description
Country: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedOn.description
Country: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

title: properties.id.description
Country: A global identifier of a country

title: properties.title.description
Country: The full name of a country

title: properties.alpha2Code.description
Country: The two-letter country code defined in the ISO 3166 standard that identifies the country.

title: properties.alpha3Code.description
Country: The three-letter country code defined in the ISO 3166 standard that identifies the country.

title: properties.numericCode.description
Country: The three digit numeric country code defined in the ISO 3166 standard that identifies the country.

title: properties.telephoneCode.description
Country: The telepone calling code for the country

title: properties.worldRegion.description
Country: The region of the world where the country resides.
